articles.title: RIP! Popular comedy actor Siva Narayanamoorthy passes away - Tamil News - Telugu Cinema - IndiaGlitz
articles.description: Siva Narayanamurthy one of the popular comedy actors of Tamil cinema has passed away last night.  He was 67 amd was receiving treatment for health problems for the past few days.
